description: Erection of a single storey side and rear extension to the house.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.

Condition : 3 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [2024-26-01 Rev A, 2024-26-02 Rev A, 2024-26-03 Rev A, 2024-26-04 Rev A, 2024-26-05 Rev A, Fire Safety Statement. Received on 08/03/2024; Arboricultural Impact Assessment and Method Statement. Received on 21/03/2024].
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the side elevation of the development hereby permitted.

Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the front elevation shall be obscure-glazed and non-opening below 1.7 metres above internal floor level. The windows shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than in accordance with the requirements of this condition.

Condition : 6 - The development hereby approved shall be implemented in accordance with the approved arboricultural impact assessment and method statement during construction to protect the health of existing trees and shall be maintained as such for the duration of the construction works.
